brandsolutions Payment & SMS Gateway Addon for 6Valley

Integrate 35+ world-class payment & 14+ popular SMS gateways with 6Valley and offer hassle-free transactions & communication to your customers.

Buy Now

More Payment Gateways - Easy Way to Scale Your Business

Expand your business with brandsolutions Payment & SMS Gateway Addon! Serve more customers with top-notch payment and SMS options.

Quick System
Integration

Make a seamless connection between 6Valley and the Payment & SMS Gateway Addon.

Multiple Payment
Option

Offer a range of payment gateways so users can pick the most convenient one for them.

Smooth Transaction
Processing

Customers can checkout by using top payment gateways and minimizing time and effort.

Enhanced Customer
Experience

Make customer interactions better with flexible payment choices and timely SMS updates.

Popular Payment Gateways for Convenient Checkout

Smarter Communication with Trending SMS Gateways

The Only Price You Need to Pay

Regular License

Buy Now

Extended License

Buy Now

Integrate It with 6Valley

Expand your business with brandsolutions Payment & SMS Gateway Addon! Serve more customers with top-notch payment and SMS options.

Purchase

Purchase brandsolutions Payment & SMS Gateway Addon from CodeCanyon.

Download

Download the addon in the form of a “.zip” file to your computer.

Upload

Upload & integrate the “.zip” file from the 6Valley admin panel.

Activate

Add your purchase credentials and quickly activate the addon.

Payment & SMS Gateway FAQs

1. What is the benefit of adding brandsolutions Payment & SMS Gateway?

Integrating this addon into your 6Valley system gives you instant access to the top payment and SMS gateways and helps your business transactions.

2. Can I use the existing payment & SMS gateways of 6Valley?

No, when you activate the payment & SMS gateway, the default payment & SMS gateways with the 6Valley system become disabled. But you’ll find all the default gateways inside this addon package. So, no need to worry!

3. Can I remove this payment & SMS gateway anytime?

Yes, you can remove it anytime from the System Addon page of the 6Valley admin panel. Once it's removed, your default payment & SMS gateways will be reverted.

4. Is it compatible with any eCommerce project?

It is only compatible with brandsolutions-built products, such as 6Valley and others.

Get the Payment & SMS Gateway for 6Valley Today!

Get Started
